data.name: Pistol Whip Official Soundtrack Vol. 1
data.detailed_description:
The official Pistol Whip launch soundtrack for your Steam music library, featuring music from Kannibalen Records. Includes both original and Pistol Whip mixes.

Inspired by God-mode action movies like John Wick and Equilibrium, the Pistol Whip Official Soundtrack is an explosive batch of hand-selected EDM powering the breakneck soundtrack featured in VR smash hit, Pistol Whip.

This soundtrack also includes an optional FLAC version and all ten launch scene posters featured in the original game.

Note: Post-launch music will be released in Vol. 2 later this year.

  • Processor: Intel or AMD CPU
  • Graphics: Yes
